short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy Google search results links with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blue Links lets you copy Google search results with a single click! Enter a search term in Google, hit enter and then click on the icon. Just that simple!
